## Public Member Functions

### advance() {#a28cf8598083957e4dbe32030b75a179b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool GCNDownwardRPTracker::advance (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI=nullptr, bool UseInternalIterator=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Move to the state at the next MI.

<code>returns</code> false if reached end of block. If <code>UseInternalIterator</code> is true, then internal iterators are used and set to process in program order. If <code>UseInternalIterator</code> is false, then it is assumed that the tracker is using an externally managed iterator, and advance&#42; calls will not update the state of the iterator. In such cases, the tracker will move to the state right before the provided <code>MI</code> and use LIS for RP calculations.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h/#l00296">296</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h">GCNRegPressure.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp/#l00603">603</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp">GCNRegPressure.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### advanceBeforeNext() {#a222d514d23098e92ecbd53e36b3c5084}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool GCNDownwardRPTracker::advanceBeforeNext (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI=nullptr, bool UseInternalIterator=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Move to the state right before the next MI or after the end of MBB.

<code>returns</code> false if reached end of the block. If <code>UseInternalIterator</code> is true, then internal iterators are used and set to process in program order. If <code>UseInternalIterator</code> is false, then it is assumed that the tracker is using an externally managed iterator, and advance&#42; calls will not update the state of the iterator. In such cases, the tracker will move to the state right before the provided <code>MI</code> and use LIS for RP calculations.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h/#l00277">277</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h">GCNRegPressure.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp/#l00512">512</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp">GCNRegPressure.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### advanceToNext() {#adda01c47a26407d9bf35e27efc904136}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void GCNDownwardRPTracker::advanceToNext (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI=nullptr, bool UseInternalIterator=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Move to the state at the MI, advanceBeforeNext has to be called first.

If <code>UseInternalIterator</code> is true, then internal iterators are used and set to process in program order. If <code>UseInternalIterator</code> is false, then it is assumed that the tracker is using an externally managed iterator, and advance&#42; calls will not update the state of the iterator. In such cases, the tracker will move to the state at the provided <code>MI</code> .

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h/#l00286">286</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h">GCNRegPressure.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp/#l00578">578</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp">GCNRegPressure.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### bumpDownwardPressure() {#a4fa250f99a782d2da223c54ecde4acd0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>GCNRegPressure GCNDownwardRPTracker::bumpDownwardPressure (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siregisterinfo">SIRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}>
Mostly copy/paste from <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerpressure-cpp">CodeGen/RegisterPressure.cpp</a> Calculate the impact <code>MI</code> will have on CurPressure and.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the speculated pressure. In order to support RP Speculation, this does not rely on the implicit program ordering in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals">LiveIntervals</a>.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h/#l00310">310</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-h">GCNRegPressure.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp/#l00655">655</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnregpressure-cpp">GCNRegPressure.cpp</a>.
